actions.text: On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment ensures that biomass technology systems and related courses are included in the list of fields that would be encompassed by the energy systems science and engineering education programs.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479 to ensure that biomass technology systems and related courses are included in the list of fields that would be encompassed by the energy systems science and engineering education programs.
